BRIEF-Mkango Resources Announces Proposed Investment In Hypromag

Stock Markets 44 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 02:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mkango Resources Announces Proposed Investment In Hypromag Sept 23 (Reuters) - Mkango Resources Ltd : * MKANGO ANNOUNCES PROPOSED INVESTMENT IN HYPROMAG * INITIAL INVESTMENT OF £300,000 TO SATISFY HYPROMAG'S MATCHED FUNDING REQUIREMENTS FOR THREE YEAR, £2.6 MILLION UK GRANT FUNDED PROJECT * WILL INVEST £300,000 FOR AN INITIAL 25% INTEREST IN HYPROMAG AND PROVIDE A £200,000 CONVERTIBLE LOAN FACILITY
